asTwoDimensional

public static java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.Object>> asTwoDimensional(QueryMatches matches)
Utility method to create a set of result tuples from the given query matches. The query tuples will be reduced to a two-dimensional result.

Parameters:
matches - the query matches
Returns:
the result tuples

asTwoDimensional

public static void asTwoDimensional(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> tuple,
                                    java.util.List<java.lang.String> keys,
                                    java.util.List<java.lang.Object> current,
                                    java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.Object>> results)
Utility method to create a set of result tuples from the given query tuple. The query tuple will be reduced to a two-dimensional result.

Parameters:
tuple - the tuple
keys - the keys
current - the current result tuple
results - the overall results
